ComicInfo.Title: Saltwater Croc; Grizzly Bear
ComicInfo.Summary:
Saltwater Croc: Some bicyclists in Australia are attacked by a saltwater crocodile.
Grizzly Bear: A man tells of being attacked by a grizzly in a river.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 22:01:50. [Issue ID 1030035]
ComicInfo.Writer: Aaron Rosenberg,Barbara Randall Kesel,Darren Vincenzo,Joe Brusha,Neo Edmund,Paul Kupperberg,Robert Greenberger
ComicInfo.Penciller: Carmen Nunez Carnero,Cristian Mallea,Dsagar Fornies,Gervasio,Gordon Purcell,Mathew Reynolds
ComicInfo.Inker: Carmen Nunez Carnero,Cristian Mallea,Dsagar Fornies,Gervasio,Gordon Purcell,Mathew Reynolds
